extensionName.message: Web Memo - Smart Notes with a Click

extensionDescription.message: Make web surfing smarter with Web Memo

no_memo.message: Looks like you haven't created any memos yet! How about starting your journey with your first note? 😊

modal_modal_question_delete.message: Would you like to reset all your data? This action cannot be undone.

select_language.message: Choose your preferred language for prompt responses

toast_save_option.message: Great! Your settings have been saved successfully.

toast_error_common.message: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.

toast_saved.message: Perfect! Your changes have been saved successfully.

error_get_page_content.message:
Oops! Summary feature isn't available on new tabs, Chrome Web Store, or Chrome settings pages. Would you mind trying again on a different page?
- If you just installed the extension, please refresh the page once!
- For YouTube pages, summarizing may take about 3 seconds. Thanks for your patience ⏳

error_get_summary.message:
Oh no! We hit a small bump while creating your summary 😥
Could you try once more? If you keep seeing this message, we'd love to help - just reach out through the contact info in the 'Guide'. We're here for you! 💪

error_get_storage.message: We couldn't access your stored data. Please try again.

toast_error_storage_exceeded.message: Your storage is getting cozy! How about clearing some space for your new amazing notes? 🗑️

wish_list_deleted.message: We've removed this item from your wish list!

wish_list_added.message: Great choice! Added to your wish list successfully!

toast_error_save.message: Sorry, we couldn't save your memo. Please try again.
